ingredients.ingredient: 1 (12 ounce) package colored candy coating melts, divided

cookingTips: Melt candy coating in short bursts to avoid burning and maintain smooth consistency
Insert lollipop sticks into doughnut holes before dipping for stability
Work quickly when dipping as coating hardens fast
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How will you keep candy coating at the right consistency for dipping, and what's the best way to prevent your cake pops from falling off the stick?
